errors.error_description: The README specifies 'Python 3' which is too vague and may lead to using an unsupported older version, as the project requires Python 3.10 or newer.
correction_candidates: You will need the latest version of Python 3 in order to use XKNX.
You will need at least Python 3.10 in order to use XKNX.
You will need Python 3.9 or newer in order to use XKNX.
You will need Python 3.10 in order to use XKNX.
errors.golden_answer: You will need at least Python 3.10 in order to use XKNX.
